document_data.name: Barracks of the Riders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Barracks of the Riders''' was the base of operations for the [[Riders of Mistledale]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The compound was located on the north side of [[Ashabenford]] in Mistledale.{{Cite interactive atlas|3800 Ashabenford}}
document_data.Activities: In addition to housing both the Riders of Mistledale and the local militia, the Barracks of the Riders also served as the town jail for Ashabenford.
